h1. The Kaiser
h2. An introduction
h3. Public disgrace
h4. The belly button, which Adam and Eve might not have had

v1. A Tibetan wild horse
v2. Anatomically on the inside
v3. To stew; to stuff up; floating dust
v4. Equipped; having arms
v5. To rile; to salt fish

h2. An alarm
h3. A tropical lizard
h4. To increase; to lift up; to rear
h5. A duck, or its down; a quilt or comforter
v1. To stare at angrily; a harsh light
v2. A veranda
v3. A plant allied to the arum
v4. An edible seaweed (if you say so)
v5. An Arab prince

v3. To entertain
v4. To dally; to put off
v5. To praise; to raise higher

h5. A pound sterling
